# Ageing topics
Learn about ageing and some of the things that are important as you get older.
![yellow unaunahi on orange background](https://healthify.nz/assets/Introduction-Images/orange-landing-top-v2.png)
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Healthy-Living/Seniors/Man-playing-the-saxophone-on-NZ-street-Unsplash__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.jpg) Ageing – what's normal and when to seek medical advice  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/a/ageing-common-health-problems "Ageing – what's normal and when to seek medical advice")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Healthy-Living/Seniors/Older-woman-sitting-at-the-beach-Unsplash__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.jpg) Falls prevention  ](https://healthify.nz/hauora-wellbeing/f/falls-prevention "Falls prevention")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Legacy/15762/older-lady-surfing-canva-665x443.png) Osteoporosis | Kōiwi ngoikore  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/o/osteoporosis "Osteoporosis | Kōiwi ngoikore")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Healthy-Living/Seniors/Older-man-in-chair-with-puppy-on-knee-canva-950x690__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.jpg) Dementia  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/d/dementia "Dementia")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Maori-and-Pasifika-people-/grandmother-cradling-newborn-baby-Canva__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.png) Eyes and ageing  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/e/eyes-and-ageing "Eyes and ageing")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Healthy-Living/Seniors/senior-couple-kayaking-and-kissing-Canva__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.jpg) Sex and ageing  ](https://healthify.nz/hauora-wellbeing/s/sex-and-ageing "Sex and ageing")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Health-A-Z/Medicines/Healthcare-worker-advising-older-woman-at-home-on-taking-medicine-Canva-950x690__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.jpg) Medicines and older adults  ](https://healthify.nz/medicines-a-z/m/medicines-a-guide-for-older-adults "Medicines and older adults")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Healthy-Living/Seniors/Older-man-on-phone-St-John-NZ__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.jpg) Supporting older people  ](https://healthify.nz/hauora-wellbeing/s/supporting-older-people "Supporting older people")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Legacy/10679/old_woman_with_cat_665x443.png) Loneliness  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/l/loneliness "Loneliness")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Maori-and-Pasifika-people-/Pasifika-women-weaving-group-HN__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.png) Support services for older people  ](https://healthify.nz/support/s/services-for-older-people-support "Support services for older people")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Healthy-Living/Seniors/older-woman-on-bus-canva-665x443.png) Coping without a car  ](https://healthify.nz/hauora-wellbeing/c/coping-without-a-car "Coping without a car")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Healthy-Living/Seniors/Older-man-with-caregiver-Canva-950x690__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.jpg) Advance care planning  ](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/a/advance-care-planning "Advance care planning")
[ ![](https://healthify.nz/assets/Maori-and-Pasifika-people-/senior-pasifika-woman-smiling-Canva__FocusFillWyIwLjAwIiwiMC4wMCIsNjY1LDQ0M10.png) Care planning and care plans  ](https://healthify.nz/hauora-wellbeing/c/care-planning-and-care-plans "Care planning and care plans")
